rooms.description: A spacious living room with large windows to maximize natural light and Vastu-compliant east-west alignment.
A comfortable dining area adjoining the living room.
The kitchen is designed with a modern layout and includes storage spaces, positioned as per Vastu for prosperity.
A functional bathroom located conveniently near the living areas while maintaining privacy.
Dedicated home office space with north-east orientation for creativity and productivity, as recommended by Vastu principles.

openings.description: North-facing entrance in accordance with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Secondary door to enhance ventilation and natural light.
Service entrance aligned with the west side for auxiliary access.

additional_features.description: A swimming pool integrated into the design, with a Vastu-compliant north-west orientation to balance energy.
The split-level transition from ground floor to upper level is designed for seamless flow and space utilization.

rooms.description: A master bedroom located towards the north-east to maximize Vastu benefits for tranquility and prosperity.
